# isPaused

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the draw loop is paused.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isPaused: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

If the value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false], the view periodically redraws the contents, at a frame rate set by the value of [doc://com.apple.metalkit/documentation/MetalKit/MTKView/preferredFramesPerSecond].

The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Configuring Drawing Behavior

- **preferredFramesPerSecond**: The rate at which the view redraws its contents.
- **enableSetNeedsDisplay**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the view responds to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/UIKit/UIView/setNeedsDisplay()].
- **draw()**: Redraws the view’s contents immediately.
- **presentsWithTransaction**: A Boolean value that determines whether the view presents its content using a Core Animation transaction.
